attributes.action: Schools/colleges should close till it's safe! Kids are scared to go school!
attributes.additional_details: My daughter is refusing to go back to school. She has a class of 30 or more pupils and is moved next to a new person everytime shes had time off! She tells me whenever she leaves school about people coughing or children saying they are too hot yet they dont get sent home ENOUGH IS ENOUGH!! OUR CHILDREN SHOULDNT BE FORCED TO ATTEND SCHOOL IS THEY ARE SCARED NO ONE WANTS THIS CORONOVIRUS! WE CERTAINLY WANT TO PROTECT OUR CHILDREN! WE CANT PROTECT THEM WHEN SOME PEOPLE DON'T HAVE SYMPTOMS
attributes.background: They need to close schools or find better ways for kids to feel safe because what schools are doing now isnt enough! The children are not spaced out enough, at least do half and half each week to try stop the spread at least. Every day my daughter heard a child cough in her class but nothing is done

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that primary schools, secondary schools and colleges across England must move to remote provision from 5 January 2021, except for vulnerable children and the children of key workers.

You can read the Prime Minister's announcement of new Covid-19 restrictions, including school closures, here: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021
